text: Had a great experience here. They were fast but thorough. The receptionists were delightful and certainly added to the experience. The extra hours they are open make this a very convenient location. I would highly recommend and would certainly come back.

name: James
text: I am 58 and have seen dozens of physicians in my life. Also have been to several urgent care centers before. I’m from out of town and needed to see a doctor, so I came here because I knew of UAB’s reputation. I have never had a more thorough examination or a more knowledgeable physician than Dr. Andrew Allen. If I could, I would have this doctor be my primary care physician. I highly recommend UAB Medical Urgent Care to anyone needing quick, thorough examination and treatment.

name: Carly Shay
text:
This UAB urgent center is dis-organized and does not seem to care about the patients health. I was very disappointed in the staff and process of my entire visit. I hope they read this and change their flaws for future customers.

They also claim not to be a covid testing center and they required me to take a covid test with them for me to be seen, seems like bad business to me.

name: Sweet'N Divine
text: Nurse Angela Absolutely Made My Day With Her Awesome Vibe & Her Care For Me. I walked Out Smiling , Something You Rarely  Get At Most Places. She Also wished me luck , as I Am Trying To Conceive  again. 💕 I think she had a belly bump of her own🥰 WAY TO GO UAB , We Need Angela x2000000 more Nurses Like Her ❤️

name: Adrienne Savage
text: I saw Dr. Allen today and I have to say that he, as well as the entire staff, were so caring, kind, and considerate. From the moment that I walked in to the office I was greeted with a warmth and genuinely concerned attitude. The check in is so simple and quick and the wait was so short that I almost thought it was a joke! The short amount of time I spent in the waiting area was comfortable, clean, and had lighting that was not too bright. I was treated kindly and with respect even though I looked like hell and felt like hell. The nurse was thorough, Dr. Allen was truly concerned and showed actual empathy. I did have to have x-rays and the technician was superb and so quick. I expected to wait a long while for the x-rays to be read and interpreted but it was at the most a 10 minute wait and I would actually say it was closer to 5 minutes. When Dr. Allen came back in he explained EVERYTHING to me, provided follow-up instructions, a work excuse, and a necessary prescription. He genuinely cared and that type of care is both refreshing and restorative. The entire process was professional while also managing to be quite personal. I wish our entire healthcare system ran this wonderfully.

name: Laney Lewis
text: The staff took amazing care of me yesterday. They all went above and beyond to make sure that I was okay, and still able to take my exams. It’s rare to find an urgent care that is that personal and helpful. They set a great example for future health care staff in Birmingham.

name: Joe Watts
text: Went there with my wife 1.5 years ago for what turned out to be a badly sprained foot. They were quick and helpful. The facility was clean and they had access to all her records since she goes to UAB for everything. Highly recommend.

name: Kelsey
text: Never a disappointing visit. Usually quick service. Kind staff. Conveniently located near UAB with all the great UAB knowledge of urgent health needs. I haven't been satisfied with UAB primary care over the years but this place works well for what it was designed.

name: Rita Rita
text: I used their services didn't get the care I needed. I went to the E R and since then I've been admitted for 7 days. I loss money if you ask me.

name: Chris Browning
text: Been here several times and have been blown away by the professionalism and kindness.  The doctors, nurses, and office staff have consistently been extremely friendly and accommodating. The doctor even recognized me during a visit for my wife even though it had been 2.5 years since I had last visited. The best urgent care facility I've ever been to.

name: Lia Brady
text: I HIGHLY recommend this clinic for any non-emergency needs. The staff is very warm and friendly and I did not spend much time waiting to be called back. The doctor I saw was Dr. John Hurt. He is incredibly personable and took the time to explain everything to me without making me feel rushed. He also sat with me after giving my diagnosis to chat and give advice about our new baby (I am 7 months pregnant). Dr. Hurt is very knowledgeable and has a great demeanor. Wish he could be my baby doctor!

name: Rosemary Wendel
text: I had an incredible experience here at UAB Urgent Care! The entire staff was friendly, helpful and extremely knowledgeable!! The team went above and beyond for my care and it was an extremely quick trip. I was seated in a room and talking with the doctor within 10 minutes! Best experience I've ever had at an urgent care!

name: Malia Tartt
text: Everyone from the front desk to the RN to Dr. Johnson greeted me with a smile and understanding. It was the middle of the flu season and the lobby was understandably full, but I got in and out of there in time to be at work by 9:30 (got there at 7:00 AM). Dr. Johnson listened to all of my concerns and was very thorough. In fact, her office hooked me up with a specialist for an appointment THAT DAY. Conveniently located downtown and opening at 7:00 AM, I'd recommend anyone looking for a doctor for any reason to give them a shout.

name: Teresa Guyton
text: I was feeling so sick and they treated me like they cared. It was fast and I liked everyone there.

name: Tim Sullivan
text:
The UAB urgent care system is quite barbaric. They make you wait in the waiting room with 20 or so sick people to see the doctor - my wait was 1.5 hours. I asked if I could wait outside the building and have them call me on my cell phone when it was my time. They said that was not allowed.

These people claim to be health care specialists???

Within 2 days of leaving urgent care my symptoms  greatly worsened. I am running out of the meds they prescribed and my sinus & lung infections are still very active. Now they want me to come back in for re-evaluation and sit around with a bunch of sick people again to catch another disease. NO THANKS!

name: Oscar R Garcia
text: Dr. Jenna Johnson is amazing! She treated my wife with a lot of care and followed up on us with blood results. What an excellent Doctor and human being! Muchas gracias!

name: Lesley Watson
text: Everyone was super nice and worked hard to figure out what I had going on. I only waited about 15-20 minutes after filling out my paperwork, and was only there a little longer overall because my symptoms were weird. The waiting room was really clean and inviting too. It's great we have an urgent care facility like this right downtown.

name: Suzanne McCreedy, Esq.
text: Today was my first visit to this clinic. The employees were all outstanding, caring, and professional. I don't think I've ever been at a medical office where everyone was so friendly! The wait time was almost non-existent. I was in and out in no time. It's such a luxury to have a great place like this where I can walk from my office to have my issue resolved.

name: kristye dixon
text: They are efficient, easy, and competent. I have nothing but high praise for this facility and the UAB network in general.

name: Allison
text: Best experience I have ever had at an urgent care!! All the staff I encountered were friendly, professional, and efficient. Would definitely go back here if needed!!!!

name: Alexandria Pearson
text: I've always been seen promptly and have always been impressed by how knowledgeable and courteous the staff is from the front desk to the back; especially Dr. Allen. I'm very thankful to have this clinic available so close by. The only small issue I've had here is every now and then a radiology tech was not available, but they let you know when you sign in if that's the case so that you can plan accordingly.

name: Amanda Horsley
text: I had a WONDERFUL experience here. I get very anxious whenever I go to the doctor, and the nurses were so friendly and eased my mind about everything. Dr. Johnson listened so carefully to all my symptoms and truly cared. She ran every test that was needed and helped me figure out the cause of what had been ailing me for so long. It was the first time I have ever felt like a doctor took the time to properly care for me.

name: Dr Sandra Atwell-Laz DC
text:
My husband entered UAB
ER 7 days ago with severe abd pain.
Diagnosised with several cancerous masses. .  Since then Ive been sleeping in hospital room - my husband cannot communicate.  His ",team" wants me here to help.. . they dont want me gone for any lengthtime.They sent me to this clinic and told me "they would help due to extraordinary circumstances".  The pain meds i had with me for 7 days ran out. "Dr. Allen would not even see me.  No help on any level.  They could have cee on my records that am not a drug abuser. Yet i was treated like one, or call my doctors. Now i could spend 8 hours in emergency room or 8 hours driving home to get my meds.  No strength of conviction - NO INTEGERITY - NO STRENGTH OF CHARACTER.  SHAME ON YOU

name: drew patchett
text: Over-all well ran. Wait times never been over an hour, even if busy. Normally in and out within an hour and a half to two hours. Everyone past the front desk is pleasant and informative. Front staff is unpleasant and dismissive. They are not fun people to talk to if you're sick.

name: crystal davenport
text: Usually not a long wait . Great staff

name: Cam Mackenzie
text: I went later in the day, so the waits were relatively long, but for a walk-in clinic that's to be expected, so I brought a book to read and was fine. Other than that, the nurses were friendly, Dr. Johnson was very helpful, and I was very pleased with my experience.

name: Amy Shackelford
text:
I had a wonderful experience at this UAB Urgent Care location. They took me back as soon as I finished my paperwork. I did not sit in the back for more than 10 minutes before seeing a doctor. The entire staff was friendly and willing to discuss my symptoms without brushing off my questions.

This location also was considered tier 1 by my Blue Cross and Blue Shield Insurance, while the hospital is considered a tier 2 location. Very glad Blue Cross left the Urgent Care as tier 1 because they were wonderful.

name: Kelsey Freeman
text: My experience here was absolutely wonderful. From the receptionist, to the nurses, to the doctor, everything was smooth and as enjoyable as it can be when you aren't feeling well. I only waited 15-20 minutes. They listened to my issues and got me fixed up! Continue the good work and thank you!

name: Arie' Smith
text:
My experience at for the last 3 visits (in 2 years) have been Much better than any care that I've received from any other urgent care facility. The staff was friendly and fast. I've never waited more than 20 mins which is a plus, given the fact that they were very busy. Found it very helpful/convenient that I was able to get an X-ray and a referral when I needed it.
As for the Reviewer that complained about a Viral infection issue, they gave you correct instructions. With a virus you must allow it to run it's course for a few days first.

name: John
text: Professional and accommodating staff! Dr.Allen was thorough and very informative about what could be causing my symptoms and discussed some possible followup testing if my condition doesn't improve with medication.  Highly recommend this clinic

name: Daniela Cook
text:
My first visit there. From the receptionist staff, the get your vital signs staff, the phlebotomist and others,  everyone was extremely professional but foremost caring!
Thank you Dr. Allen for not rushing through my visit . I truly felt that I was getting the best care

name: Jillian Carter
text: Love this place! It is a very clean environment  and everyone was nice. The time I spent there was phenomenal.

name: Amber LeClaire
text: I've been here a few times and everyone is so friendly and helpful. No surly attitudes that you find a lot of urgent care facilities. No long waits either. This is by far the top urgent care facility in Birmingham!

name: Blastnoe06
text: Terrible . the xray tech didn't know the difference between my left and right shoulder. She had to xray me twice due to that .the physician assistant said my heart sounded good  I told her nobody listened to my heart .then she proceeds to listen after my prompting. Dont waste your time at this clinic .

name: Ed Duke
text: Except for the bad address everything else was 100% better than expected. Thought it would be a long and difficult wait but was almost immediately.

name: Melissa Fancher
text: Clean facility, staff appear to have all equipment and processes in place to do their job efficiently. However, in my experience with this staff they are very insensitive to sinus issues. I highly recommend going elsewhere. Not only was I feeling terrible from sinus pressure, but I left feeling like they did not care about my needs as a patient.

name: Rokeia Westbrook
text: Service and providers are always nice and considerate. Plus, the nurses are ALWAYS there with compassion.

name: Joseph Gray
text: I came in because I had a sudden sickness and the team here saw me promptly, had me feeling well taken care of long before we even had results. The team works like a well oiled machine here and it shows.  It feels like they care and are knowledgeable- the two qualities I look for most in urgent care.

name: David Ball
text: The staff are fantastic and are quite professional.  Everything was handled efficiently and to my satisfaction.  I highly recommend this Urgentcare site.

name: Bess Booth
text: Told me it would take 2-3 to get my cultures back. Called to check on them, the told me they would take 10 business days, called 10 business days later (2 weeks), told me I would have to come back in, do the whole process over again just to get some antibiotic, since too much time had passed. Never again

name: Velda Richardson
text: I have had good care from the Staff at UAB Urgent Care.

name: Lynn Duvall
text: Both times I was seen quickly by friendly, knowledgable professionals. Diagnosis and treatment appropriate and thorough. A real asset to the community that I highly recommend.

name: Barbara Bonfield
text: I found the treatment at the Urgent Care Clinic outstanding. Dr Andrew Allen was thorough in his examination and consideration of my issues.The treatment that he recommended was conservative and I agreed with him. We are fortunate to have this facility in Bham.

name: Altovise Crear
text: Always good service!

name: Omar Maximo
text: Polite, caring, and they figured what I had in a manner of hours (had to get a CT scan for that). Overall, great experience

name: Liz Appling
text: I was seen at this Urgent Care location for a sprain/ligament injury this past Sunday and I could not have been happier with the treatment I received. The staff got me in a room immediately and had x-rays done within 15 minutes. The nurses really took the time to listen to me and take me seriously when I explained that my tumble down the stairs was a result of ongoing and sporadic numbness in my legs and hands and spells of intense dizziness. They got me in contact with a facility that plans to get to the root of the problem. I'm so thankful to them for taking me seriously when no other doctor did because "I'm 29 and healthy, so the numbness and dizziness isn't something I should worry about." I digress, but please know that THESE NURSES ROCK!!!!

name: Johnnecia Peterson
text: I have been here since 1:45, and was told when I got here that there was a 30 minute wait. And yet it turned into two hours!! And on top of all that they took someone that came 45min after me and when I asked they couldn’t give me a reason why !! Because I was also told when I first came that patients were seen based on arrival times!!

name: Vonda Holman-Bell
text: They sent me home with a shot only.  I did not receive a Rx for Strep.  I’m extremely sick and can’t return to work.

name: Leslie Hill
text: I will NEVER go again....the lady told me if I'm still feeling the same way in 3 days to come back. I had to ask for a shot🙄 I paid $25 for nothing. Then the take home instructions said I had an upper respiratory infection and she told me it was nothing but my sinus. Just a waste of time and money!

name: Chris Bright
text: Dont not go here if you are pressed for time no peolpe in waiting room and not noticeable busy in back lot of standing around.A simple check for cold/flu symptoms took 2 and a half hours and i left before they got last result from nose swab.

name: LaQuinta Megginson
text: 1st visit was successful, 2nd visit was mediocre, I don't feel my problem was resolved, just patched over. My 3rd visit there, 2nd visit with this same lady on yesterday, she walked in and immediately said, "I'm gonna tell you now you'll be dealing with this for the next 8-10 days". Mind you she hadn't touched me nor asked me any questions. She went on to tell me that we'd be treating it systematically, I asked her to explain she stated otc sinus meds, otc cough meds I stopped her and asked about antibiotics she said this is viral and no antibiotic would touch it. I mentioned my symptoms again she totally disregarded them. Now she still had not touched me, nor looked in my ears, eyes, nose or my mouth. I got up and said "I'm not going to be playing around with my health like this" as I was leaving the exam room (with no exam having happened) she said "I've been formally trained I know what I'm talking about", I didn't respond I had my copay credited back to my card and went to another Urgent care where I was seen by a real Dr. who had an actual bedside manner and knew that you had to touch a patient and look at and listen to their patient. Had chest Xrays and blood work done. I left with 3 prescriptions and a couple of shots. So much for her formal training. The male Dr was nice and handled my issue well. She is not equipped to deal with humans. Not my 1st choice. I don't plan on willingly going there again. The rest of the staff were pleasant and kind.

name: Linda Shields
text: Fast, courteous, and knowledgeable care -- what more could you want?

name: Vi Parramore
text: Excellent care by knowledgeable, caring staff!

name: Aidan C
text: My mother has been here twice and turned away twice because they had already taken their last patient. 2 hours before they are supposed to close. Pitiful.

name: Timothy Richey
text: Nurse and doctor were very rude and non accommodating. Refused to help with medical leave  papers. When I asked if they could do anything about the ear pressure, the doctor stated no we aren't ear surgeons in a condescending tone.

name: Heiress
text: Extremely slow and NO patients... been waiting over 30 minutes.

name: Tracy Thornton
text: They had a two hour wait after calling and telling me that it was not a long wait. After finally getting called back i was told that there was another two hour wait due to a major procedure. I also picked up a new virus from being there as the would not let me sit in my car and be called like most urgent care places do. I will NOT be going there again and i love UAB.

name: Michael Cooper
text: I was sent to this place by my doctor for an x-ray of my foot. After driving downtown, having my vitals taken, being seen by a nurse and a physician's assistant, and waiting for 45 minutes, I was finally told (but only after I asked) that their x-ray machine was not working. What a pathetic excuse for an "urgent care" facility!

name: Karri Neal
text: I checked the hours before arriving and their phone message stated they closed at 7. I arrived at 6:25 only to have them shut the lights off as I walked through the door. They said the doctor was closing early and to come back the next morning when they open. Hours should state they close at 6:30 if they're turning off lights at 6:25.

name: Sabrina Long
text: Very nice and efficient!

name: Dionne Stewart
text: Professional,  friendly,  effective, and efficient care.

name: Bruce Roberts
text:
I just wanted to thank everyone at Southern Rapid Care for your expertise in helping me with a bladder problem.
The staff is very professional and demonstrate great knowledge of health care services.  They're compassionate,  understanding and know how to treat people. I felt love from everyone that I encountered.
Special thanks to Mary, Stacey and Shelia.

name: Barbara Kennedy
text:
From out of town and had a medical problem.
Very nervous about going to after care but now I want to take all of them home with me.
From stepping into the building , it is was clean , well organized and a  wonderful  top notched
receptionist. She was so professional, not on her phone but worked at getting everyone seen to.
Very fast for my appointment.  Dr. Julie one day and Dr. Elizabeth  were so professional and so caring.
Really liked the way they helped me and made me feel as if they cared.
One of the best experience I have ever had going to the doctor.
Thanks again for all you did for me. Barbara Kennedy

name: John Lonergan
text: Slow and did not follow thier own policy of taking patients in order. My daughter had a severe sore throat and ear ache. We came here because it was recommended to us. They admitted three people who came in after us and let three soft ball players in before us so they could get a covid test for travel which aparently trumps a fever sore throat and ear ache. Will not return.

name: Shanna Siple
text: My husband, kids and I came to enjoy your beautiful city for Spring Break. My husband started having a tooth issue on the drive down. We went in Sunday morning and the Dr. took her time, treated him with two shots and antibiotics so we could enjoy our time. We really appreciate your staff and services. If you are from out of town and need care, please stop in here! They were great and service was fast!

name: Mark Bochantin
text: We filled out the paperwork and my wife stood in line (1 person that just walked in) for about 15 minutes being ignored she finally set the clipboard next to the receptionist and sat down. While waiting they call 2 other people into the back that came in after us to be seen. An hour later the receptionist said that our insurance wasn't active and tossed her drivers license and paperwork towards me and stated that she could not be seen.  Even though I was willing to pay cash. Our insurance was active. This is the rudest place we have ever been to and we highly suggest to go to another urgent care. The next place we went to we were seen in 15 minutes with no problems.

name: Seth Smith
text: I was very impressed with this urgent care facility. We walked right in (no appointment) and waited less than 30 minutes for my 13 month old son to be seen. From the front desk staff to the nurse to the doctor we saw, everyone was so wonderful to us and my son. He was diagnosed quickly and correctly with an ear infection and the medicine prescribed did the trick. I would highly recommend this urgent care facility to both locals and vacationers.

name: Josey Rochester
text: I was happy with my experience with the COVID testing. But after waiting a week for the late results, they wouldn’t email me with my results for my workplace to see. Understandable. But they emailed my manager who went, her results. They told me to send my mom with a note from me.  I sent my father with a picture of my signature, since I’m quarantined. They would not help us. My father is also my emergency contact, BTW. They have so much of his identifying information.  I’m ranting now because they want me to come get the results myself. They suggested it!. But I have the virus. Good looking out. Sorry to leave a bad review but I don’t want to be a Karen in real life.

name: Bethany S
text: Do not go here. At 12:13 PM on December 23rd, 2020 I went to Southern Rapid Care for a swollen eye. There was a sign on the door that said all patients were required to wear masks. The receptionist and another worker accompanying her at the front were not wearing masks. There were no coronavirus protective procedures in place. Nurse practitioner Sheila Stephens came into my room wearing a mask and immediately began to touch my eyebrow, without washing her hands and without gloves. She asked me to lie down on the table. She pulled off my mask and put a blue sheet over my face while the eyebrow was left exposed. Without any numbing medicine she then jammed a needle into the abscess, a very painful process that I groaned through. After using a needle she took her ungloved hands and squeezed at the area, forcing anything inside out. After she finished she told me it would bleed for a while and neglected to give me anything to soak the blood. I had to grab a kleenex for myself in an open, dusty, box to stop the bleeding. As I looked around the room I noticed a dried, smeared, puddle of blood sitting in the middle of the room. The bed sheets were also uncovered and had various dried stains, dog hair, human hair, and dirt covering them. They tried to give me rocephin which I denied, I explained that Rocephin causes terrible lower back pain that leaves me unable to walk. She then told me they would give me two shots of clindamycin instead. To my surprise it had acted the same way to my lower back as rocephin. A nurse came in to hand off paperwork to me and I asked her if it was supposed to feel this painful, she said it could be uncomfortable. She tried to get me to stand and move to the counter to sign paperwork so I attempted and groaned in pain as I couldn’t move. She left as I started crying in pain and another woman came into the room. She was slender, tall, with brown hair and sadly I did not catch her name. She came in and demanded with an aggressive tone I stand up, I told her I could not because of the amount of pain I was in. She told me I would feel better if I stood up so I tried again and fell back on the bed due to the pain. I began crying harder because of the pain and told her once more I could not. Then she got angrier and lowered her tone with clear aggression. She told me “I gave a five year old this shot and he was running around after it.” I began crying even harder due to being belittled and humiliated while sitting with clear pain. She kept demanding I stand up and repeating that children run around after these shots. I told her through my tears to stop talking to me like that and she became angrier and left the room. After I signed some papers and grabbed my medication off the counter I attempted to move to the door and nearly fell to the floor. I sat in one of the chairs in my room while sobbing and heard the angry woman talking about me to the other workers outside. They began laughing after I heard her describe my situation, they laughed the entire time I was sobbing and unable to walk. My mom then texted me wondering why I wasn’t out in the waiting room and told me the receptionist had told her that they were helping me to the waiting room. I texted her that I needed help to walk and she told me she was not allowed in. I then began crawling alongside the wall for support, sobbing openly from pain and humiliation I was being put through. As I was walking there were multiple workers in the main area staring at me and not offering assistance. Halfway down the hall my mother and the receptionist came to grab me as I nearly fell to the floor and helped me walk. As they opened the door the brown haired woman said “Make her open the door herself, she doesn’t need all that.” My mother noted she saw an unused wheelchair that I could have been offered but was not. I was neglected heavily at Southern Rapid Care and will be making formal complaints. Do NOT go here.

name: Olivia Ruthstrom
text: I had a really bad rash and what we thought might be an infection on my arm. I went to this urgent care while on vacation and they were amazing! I was in and out in 45 minutes, medicine sent to pharmacy and all! They were so helpful and sweet. I recommend, especially if from out of town.

name: Karen May-Meinell
text: A clean and nice facility.  The staff was very efficient, pleasant and very caring.  The nurse practitioner was also very efficient and really does care about her patients well being!! She and her staff did a terrific job of taking care of my needs.  If you become ill enough that you need to see a doctor, I highly recommend this facility!!!

name: Ryan Dunlap
text: Don't go for 24-hour COVID testing and don't expect someone to pick up the phone or return a message. I needed a 24 hour test to be able to return to work. I have tried calling at least 30 times and left 4 messages to ask if the results were there. I finally received a phone call from a very unpleasant person growling that they will call me when the results returned and the phone hung up. I never leave reviews, good or bad. This is a first. I understand the staff is busy, but answering the phone with good customer service is paramount in my opinion. Rant over...

name: Lilliana Rubio
text: Usually don’t write reviews but this place is horrible!! The employees are so rude for no reason at all and there aren’t many people waiting but there is still a 2 hour wait. I’m sure the employees are stressed but there is no reason for them to be so rude when their day has barely started. Don’t come here

name: Snuggle Muffins
text: This place is extremely rude and neglectful towards their patients. No covid protective procedures are met.

name: Sadie Bruns
text: We saw Elizabeth Michon, CRNP over the weekend for my 4 year old for stitches after a barnacle laceration. She was awesome! We had a great experience with everyone there!

name: Cephia Blackwell
text: I’ve been coming here for over a year and the experience has always been okay. However the nurse Liz has always been fantastic to me. But about a week ago I developed a very painful infection. I called to ask if I needed to come in or just have them send meds to my pharmacy. I wasn’t sure the protocol with covid going on. No answer. Called the next day same thing. Then a third time the day after that. Finally on the fourth day I got a call back. I was in so much pain and they couldn’t even return my call.

name: Shira Williams
text: This place is amazing! The staff is friendly and efficient. I sent two athletes back to back and they were well taken care of. Special thanks to Julie, Ashley, Rochelle & Suzie!

name: Melissa Dobson
text: My husband and I went in with our son and immediately they thought he was taking drugs. He had an episode kind of like a seizure and we took him here to see if they could help. We are unfamiliar with the area and are only here temporarily. The nurses kept asking if he had taken anything that he wasn't supposed to. He said no. And we know that to be true. Dr Cameron diagnosed him as hyperventilating and sent us on our way. $150 for nothing! No recommendations to see anyone else or even have any tests run. What they failed to listen to is that these episodes have happened 3 other times in the last year. I took it upon myself as an advocate for my child to have blood tests run and an MRI. We finally have some answers. So sad that this place will just write you off if they think you have been taking things your not supposed to. Whatever happened to listening to the patient and finding out answers instead of believing what you think to be true.

name: Tiffany Stumler
text: We were on vacation and had a water incident. We went in for a neck injury and were quickly seen by Dr. Cameron.  Additional imaging was required and the staff helped to arrange for this at a local facility. Stacy worked with my insurance company and the imaging facility to move the process forward quickly and smoothly.  Their office team was quick to return phone calls and everyone I interacted with was warm, compassionate, and welcoming. They have a lot of good reviews and there is a reason for this! Highly recommend.

name: alec allen
text: Very nice people

name: Ianx Michon
text: Absolutely incredible health care provided here. I have used this facility multiple times in my return to the area from the military. The staff is extremely knowledgeable, well mannered, and above all else incredibly quick and thorough. I recall seeing a advertisement for this clinic along the beach express which said “ER skills without the ER bills” and that is a spot on phrase for such a great establishment. Will be using this healthcare provider for the rest of my life.

name: Logan Harrington
text: Everyone was so helpful! I got in and out very quickly. Would definitely recommend!!!

name: Nicholas Anderton
text: Very quick and easy, they were very straight forward and caring. If I could give one piece of advice it would be, dont rush the discharge speech. By the end I had two shots in either hip, so now I hurt (from what I thought to be a bug bite) plus my butt hurts, and i also had no clue everything was done electronically. So I felt a bit rushed but still cared for.

name: Susan Norrell
text: Going to Southern Rapid Care was an excellent experience for me. The doctor was extremely thorough and took her time to give me the best care I could have received. What a wonderful experience, not to mention I feel like a new person today!

name: Barb Harris
text:
Very disappointed!  My husband was there yesterday, with his mask on. He texted me and said 3/4 of the people waiting did not have a mask on!  He was there for 1 1/2 hrs. He also said some were there to be tested for Covid!!!!
I can't even get in my Dr's office without a temp check and mask!

name: Melissa Shelton
text: No one wearing masks! As front line workers who are most likely the ones to be exposed to COVID patients, they also become  the ones most likely to spread it! Very irresponsible not to protect patients by a simple act during a global pandemic.

name: Sandy H
text: The reviews for this place tell the truth.  Short wait, helpful staff.  We only carry a major medical health policy.  We paid an initial fee of $150.00.  My husband was back with the doctor for about 10 minutes.  He was given shots to get him back on his feet.  The shots were covered under the $150.  We live locally and will go again should we have an issue.  Top Notch!

name: Debby Whaley
text: Southern Rapid Care was fantastic!  My daughter got strep on our vacation and we took her here.  Everyone was so sweet, kind, and sympathetic!  They treated her aggressively and she was back to having fun the next day.  Plus we only waited a few minutes before seeing the doctor and the office was clean and bright.  Thank you!

name: Kathy Brant
text: I needed an Urgent Care while on vacation.  I am so glad I picked Southern Rapid Care.  The receptionist was very nice.  Didn't have a long wait.  The nurse was very caring and the Nurse practitioner was awesome.  Everyone on staff was very kind and compassionate.  If you need an Urgent Care facility, I highly recommend you come here.

name: Audrey Love
text: The best experience I have ever had at a urgent care clinic! I was on vacation and happened to get sick. The staff was so friendly and happy to help me! I will totally go back there if I need anything! I would recommend them to everyone!

name: Lyndsey Alford
text: I would have given 5 stars if they would answer the phone.

name: Miss Vickey Smalley
text: I have never been so pleased with a visit. My granddaughter was in an asthma attack on vacation when I googled for urgent care places. The reviews here were amazing and they lived up to them.  My granddaughter is almost 4 and was in an asthma attack and we were taken back as quick as we said what was wrong.  The doctor and nurses there were amazing at treating her.  We were traveling back home when we left Rapid Care yesterday so the doctor took special precautions to make sure she was ready to ride.  Thank you to each of you for your concern for her!  When we left she said “I like going to the doctor”. Your highest compliment!!!

name: April Glenn
text: We had such a great experience here! Our daughter was sick while we were on vacation. The doctor and nurses were so friendly and took such great care of her! I highly recommend them!

name: Marette Kouri
text: This is by far the best urgent care clinic we have ever been to. The staff were very friendly and caring. The Dr. was absolutely fantastic. She was very attentive and thorough. The entire staff was awesome. The clinic was also very clean. Thank you so very much!

resp.text: Wow! What an incredible review, Marette. Thank you so much! You've stroked our ego with your kind words but we promise to stay humble and continue striving for perfection. We know each day we have to be a little better than the day before. Please let us know if there is anything we can do in the future and thanks again!

name: Cody Doyle
text: Came to Gulf Shores on vacation, ended up with a fever and feeling absolutely terrible after two days here. Went to this urgent care and was seen within 30 minutes. Doctor gave me a diagnosis and a couple steroid shots, and an antibiotic. Felt better by that afternoon. Would recommend this clinic, very clean and nice!

name: Matthew Walker
text: My son had an earache while we were on vacation in Gulf Shores this last week. I called Southern Rapid Care to ask if they took our insurance, and they were more than happy to check this for me. They got my son in quickly, and everyone was so nice/friendly from the receptionist, to the nurse, to Dr. Cameron. My son even got a popsicle at the end! Overall great experience, and would highly recommend to anyone who needs to see an urgent care in the Gulf Shores area.

name: kathleen Blair
text: Took my 89 yo mother there this AM for respiratory infection.  In and out in less than 30 minutes and that included a chest X-Ray. Accepted her insurance.  They coordinated where to send scripts that her insurance would cover. Excellent professional caring beautiful facilities. She’s better already. What an excellent resource

resp.text:
Kathleen,

Thank you so much for leaving us such a glowing review. We're proud and honored to be able to take care of your mother and we aim to always provide the same level of care and concern you have experienced. If we ever do disappoint, please let us know and we will happily make the situation right again. We hope your mother is doing much better now and please do not hesitate to reach out should you need anything else. Thanks again!

name: Matt Robinson
text: The staff was incredible. Jess, Stacy, and Liz were all so helpful and caring! They all were amazing at making light of what was a scary situation for us. Their calming demeanor and friendliness put our minds at ease. I can’t express enough, just how amazing this staff is. I would recommend this clinic to anyone.

resp.text:
Matt,

We're incredibly grateful that you choose Southern Rapid Care to take care of your ailments and we're proud that we've been able to do right by you. We take pride in what we do and we want everyone, no a matter the illness, to leave our building knowing what quality healthcare should look like. Please let us know if we can do anything for you in the future. In the meantime, rest, relax and take good care of yourself!

name: maya peach
text: When traveling south for the winter it's hard to decide where to go when you have a health issue.   I read reviews on several urgent care centers and Southern Rapid Care had the best reviews and now I know why.  The staff is very professional, knowledgable and everyone is friendly!  The facility is impeccably clean.   I won't hesitate to go there again and highly recommend Southern Rapid Care.

name: lynn ingram
text:
My wife went here morning with a respiratory infection.  We had a quick response and excellent care.  The front staff was so friendly and pleasant.  The doctor was very responsive.  Highly recommend this place
.

name: Noel Owens
text: Great staff!!!! Very attentive.  Concerned with your health.  Doctor was was knowledgeable as well as the staff.  They were all on the same page.  We were confident we were getting the best care possible.

name: Angela Miller
text: As a local, I have frequented each urgent care in the area. Since this place opened- I will never go anywhere else. They are kind, patient, knowledgeable, and caring. The service is the same each and every time I walk in. The facility is clean, and even on their busiest days, the service does not diminish one iota. I’m extremely thankful for their presence in Orange Beach. It was much needed!

resp.text: Angela,  We are extremely grateful to be here! It is a proud moment every time we hear someone express what you have here. It never gets old and its what we live for. Orange Beach and the surrounding communities have been wonderful to us and we plan on sticking around for many years to come. Thank you for your kind words and for giving Southern Rapid Care a chance. We feel strongly that if we can ever get a customer in our building one time, they won't prefer to go anywhere else. Thank you again, Angela and please let us know if there is ever anything we can do for you moving forward!

name: Betsy Gamble
text: No one wants to get sick on vacation, but if you do, this is the place to go! I took both of my kids here today and from the moment we walked in, I was impressed. The two ladies at the desk were both very kind and helpful, they had a children’s table with coloring books and crayons in the waiting room and everything was extremely clean. The nurse and nurse practitioner couldn’t have been nicer and made us feel so comfortable, welcomed and explained in detail what was going on with my children. Although it was a quick visit, it didn’t feel rushed at all and was actually pleasant... especially when they gave us all popsicles! I highly recommend Southern Rapid Care!!

name: Matthew Suhre
text: My family and I were visiting from out of state and needed an Urgent Care facility. Southern Rapid Care was the only one open, and was 20 minutes from closing. We called to let them know we were coming and they told us they would wait. We arrived and the staff was extremely courteous, friendly, and professional. The lobby and facility were clean and well kept. The nurse and nurse practitioner were thorough and answered all of our questions. They were not in a hurry and stayed almost an hour after closing time to ensure my wife received proper care. This is the best urgent Care facility I've ever been to. I Highly recommend Southern Rapid care.

resp.text:
Matthew,

Thanks for dropping us a line and letting us know about your experience here. People don't normally come to us in their best condition so we strive to make sure you are comfortable and properly cared for while you're with us. We are proud you chose Southern Rapid Care and hope that you enjoy the rest of your stay here on the Alabama coast. Please don't hesitate to give us a shout if you need anything in the meantime!

name: Krysten Duffy
text: We had to make a visit while on vacation. My daughter wasn’t feeling well.  The entire staff was amazing from the minute we walked in.  They had us in and out so we didn’t lose a day of vacation waiting at urgent care. Super friendly!   They treated her and she was feeling better the next day. Thank you for helping her enjoy the rest of our vacation !!

resp.text:
Krysten,

It's never a fun experience to take a vacation and then have to deal with someone feeling under the weather while trying to enjoy your trip. However, it sounds like such a situation struck your family and we're proud you chose us to help alleviate the dilemma. We are thrilled you had such a pain free experience and hope your daughter has made a full recovery from the symptoms she was experiencing. We're glad you were also able to enjoy the rest of your vacation. Please let us know if you need anything in the future.

name: Texas Longhorn
text: Such a wonderful experience with super nice workers, nurse staff and doctor. Spent about 45 mins total and so very pleased with the facility. Went in with a sinus infection  and left with a couple of shots and on the road to recovery. Having no insurance the visit was $150 which I didnt think was too bad. Great place if you're feeling bad.

name: Sierra O'Neal
text: My sister in law went here last weekend and was very pleased so I decided to go there today  and I was very pleased as well. The staff was great, it was bright, clean, & I was in and out in 30min. We will definitely be going here from now on!

name: Pam Starr
text: Thanks to medical staff at Southern Rapid Care for fixing me up!  I'm one of those seasonal residents with no local physician and walked in seeking treatment.  I was seen immediately and all staff from reception, to lab, to medical assistants, and physician were kind, helpful, and professional. The facility is welcoming and well run.  I'll definitely return should the need arise!

resp.text:
Pam,

Well we hope that need doesn't arise but we're here if you need us! We're always pumped to know that we can serve as a place for people in your situation to go and get sound medical care. Please let us know if you need anything. We value and appreciate our seasonal customers just as much as anyone else! Thanks again!

name: Mary smith
text: Lovely space. Staff were all friendly and sweet to my 5 year old twins that were sick.  The only problem was they were very slow considering they weren’t busy at all. But still I’d go back just because they were thorough and caring and knowledgeable too.

resp.text: Hey Mary! Thanks for leaving us some feedback on your experiences here at Southern Rapid Care. We're thrilled you were pleased with the customer service and care you received. We also wish we had met your expectations relative to your wait time, especially if we weren't very busy. We strive to have people in and out as quickly as possible without compromising the quality of care in which we deliver. Your review has been noted and we will work even harder in the future to ensure you and others don't have to wait unnecessarily in the future. We hope you have a wonderful day and if there is anything we can do for you in the future, please let us know.

name: Martin Garnick
text: This is a 5 star facility. From the moment you walk in and greeted by the receptionist to RN for the initial assessment to the NP for evaluation you are treated compassionately and professionally. They talk and listen to you and not the computer. If I lived in the area I would choose them as my primary care.

resp.text:
Martin,

Thank you kindly for your review! We wish you lived in the area too because we would love to serve as your primary care. However, you're also welcome to use us as you need us when you are in town. If you've left already to return home, we hope you enjoyed your stay down in Orange Beach and trust that you'll look us up in the future should the need arise. Thank you again and safe travels in both directions!

name: Jerrod Moore
text: This is where you want to go. Rapid and clean. Stacy was amazing. I came here after waiting for over 2 hours at another clinic. Now off to the beach to be with my family 😀

name: Sharnal Humes
text: We are from out of town and had an incident where our toddler fell and hit the corner of his eye on a chair and split it open. From being Out of town, we were worried with where we took our toddler to get care as this was our first time visiting the area. After googling quickly some places, we came across SRC and decided it seemed like a good place to try to get care for our son’s incident especially with it being later at night. The receptionist, nurses and doctor were awesome. Our son received great care and we felt confident in the doctor he saw and her experience with these types of situations. We got in and out with stitches In less than an hour and our three year old reacted so well with the staff and how calm and friendly they were. They even made his night better with a popsicle at the end of the visit. So thankful for their care and facility to care for him and our family during a stressful moment.

name: Forest Creek Estates
text: On vacation from Texas, had an issue with my 2 month old baby, these are the friendliest staff I have ever met and I’ve worked with doctors for 10 years!  Highly recommend coming to this location!

name: Katie Crews
text: Clean, friendly nurse, NP, and staff. I was worried about going to an urgent care in a different city but I was quickly pleased with my care I received. They were thorough and efficient. I highly suggest this place if you are on vacation or if you live in town.

name: Tim Hullender
text: Had a major parent fail with kiddo- he had bad sun burn. They made me feel better and hooked him up with relief! Two days later he was better and ready to hit the beach again... with proper sun screen!

name: Colleen Whittaker
text:
Great experience here!  I'm from out of state & chose Southern Rapid Care because of the reviews.  So glad I went here!
I was seen immediately,  staff was very helpful & friendly.  Dr Cameron was caring & efficient.

resp.text: Colleen,  Thank you kindly for choosing Southern Rapid Care. We are tickled that you had a positive encounter with our staff and physicians. Reviews are nice but its much better when those reviews come to life in a real experience and we're happy to deliver a thorough yet efficient urgent care visit for you. Please let us know if you need anything going forward. We are always happy to help, especially when it comes to staying healthy and getting back to normal life a little faster. Thanks again!

name: Morgan Truelove Crabtree
text:
My husband and I went to Southern Rapid Care this afternoon around 7:40 to check out an extreme wasp sting that has his hand, wrist and arm continuing to swell, blister, pus and send red stripes up his arm.  I banged on the door to finally find a “nurse” come to the door to turn us away.  I told her he had been stung and was obviously allergic and she did absolutely nothing but turn us away.  I told her he just needed an EPI pen.  She could have cared less and literally pulled the door shut on us.  We went to another urgent care in town which was closed and to CVS, which was also closed. I’m absolutely appalled that this “care giver” shut the door on us.  I hope no one ever waste their time going there for help, because they simply won’t give it.  Had that been his throat and it closing up, he could have died. She had no idea where the sting was, she just turned us away. Never again. Don’t waste your time.  Absolutely the worst place for medical help in Orange Beach. Maybe one day we will have someone that cares.
-locals

name: Katie Avant
text:
This urgent care REFUSED CARE for my husband when he was on the verge of HEAT STROKE on May 7, 2019.
All because the person who drove him, forgot to grab his ID. Nor would the staff give him ice or water while his friend fetched his ID. They NEVER CHECKED HIS VITALS. My husband is a local of 32 years who works on the beach for 14 hours a day and has done so for years. The two Women at the front desk just taunted him because he was ill, while refusing care. Even the Doctor refused. My husband was vomiting, cramping, and about to pass out. The situation was dire, he had stopped sweating. Luckily, he is a National Guard Medic who had an old saline bag. He had to walk me through the IV process, because THIS WAS AN EMERGENCY. SHAME ON YOU Southern Rapid Care!!!!

resp.text:
Katie,

Please give us a call so we can talk about this situation with you. Your husband not having his ID would have been the only reason we couldn't treat him, given the situation. Legally, we have to be able to verify that someone is who they claim to be before we can create medical charts/documents for said person. Please reach out and let one of our managers speak to you about this situation.

name: Lynn Watts
text: When a sick patience comes in with a temperature of 101.7 it would be nice not to be greeted by a snooty receptionist as if you’re bothering her.  A little bed side manner goes a long way!

name: Libby R
text: Myself and my children both have used Southern Rapid Care many times. Every time we have gone we’ve had wonderful experiences. The entire staff is extremely caring and knowledgeable and make you fill well taken care of. I’m so grateful to have them right down the road and even if I didn’t I would make the drive just for my visits!

resp.text:
Libby,

Thanks so much for dropping us a line! We're proud to be right down the road from you and pleased you would choose us even if we weren't. It makes all of our staff smile when I share comments such as yours. We take tremendous pride in the work we put forth and I'm pleased that it pays off and is noticed. Thanks again for taking time out of your personal life to provide a review for us. Please don't hesitate to let us know if we can ever do anything for you in the future.

name: Jennifer Jackson
text:
We drove all the way down from Loxley to have my two year old evaluated. He has congenital abnormalities that can be intimidating to doctors and practitioners who aren't familiar with him. We have been turned away at urgent care facilities in the past, and usually end up having to spend the day at the ER at children's.

They had absolutely no reservations about seeing him here, and approached his conditions with a confidence that only years of experience breeds. They were incredibly efficient, friendly, and compassionate. The nurse practitioner had even thoroughly looked over his medical history prior to coming into the room, which spoke volumes for the level of care.

They gained loyal customers today!

resp.text:
Jennifer,

Thank you so much for the kind words. We're incredibly grateful to have you and your family as loyal customers. Although, we do hate that you have to make the trek down from Loxley. I'm sure in some cases that drive can be better than the alternative though so we appreciate your willingness to come down to see us. We're ecstatic that you've had such a wonderful experience with us and hope we always maintain an optimal level of patient care. Please let us know if there is anything in the immediate future or beyond that we can do for you and thanks again for your support and loyalty.

name: Amy Johnson
text: Took daughter in after being up all night sick while on vacation. Absolutely amazing staff!!! Could not have asked for better treatment!!!!! Thank you ladies for everything!!!!

name: susan giannini
text: Saw Dr. Cameron to get established as his patient here. Tired of the "games" played at local doctor offices. Dr. Cameron, and the entire staff, were personable, professional, knowledgeable, and kind. I was seen very quickly. I LOVE THIS PLACE!!

resp.text:
Susan,

We absolutely love that you love this place! Dr. Cameron is a no nonsense and games kind of guy. Thank you for taking time to review us with such high regards. Please let us know if we can ever be of assistance to you or your family in the future.

name: misty gaut
text: Extremely pleased with Southern Rapid Care from check in to check out! PA and nurses were great!

name: Ernest Loper
text: The staff is very positive and great at getting you what you need quickly.  The longest part of my visit was paperwork and in just 24hrs I feel a lot better (sinuses).

name: Lonna Wilks
text: I was on vacation in Gulf Shores and got super sick. I was referred to this clinic. The entire staff, Physician Assistants and nurses were beyond helpful and oh so friendly. I felt as if I had been there 100 times. The care I received was second to none! I can't say enough positive things about them. Shout out to these that treated me so well!!! Stacy, Liz and Richard! You are all the best!!! I live approximately 1.5 hours from the clinic and I can't say that I won't drive back for this kind of care again!

resp.text:
Lonna,

We are so excited to hear about your experience in our clinic and with our staff. It's also delightful that you would be willing to share said experience with the masses on Google! Thank you kindly for giving our facility a chance and we are proud we were able to come through in the clutch for you while you were on vacation. Please don't hesitate to come on by anytime its needed. Until then, stay healthy and thanks again for dropping us a line.

name: Louise Jones
text:
The most friendliest staff  I have ever ran across in 20 years as a parent
This evening my twin daughters who we found out have the flu..was treated with the kindest natured staff all round. From entering the building to the moment we left I have never felt such warm heart felt care anywhere.
Elizabeth the Nurse practitioner was the most God given Angel I had ever met..I just know she treats every child with such love care and compassion..that  she mets on a daily basis. 5 stars Southern Rapid I am eased and thrilled to know such amazing people practice in my local area.

resp.text:
Louise,

Thank you so much for such a heartfelt message. Elizabeth is definitely exactly as you described. We're not sure she knows any other way other than being thorough, friendly and helpful. It's unfortunate that both your girls had flu but we're certainly proud you chose us to care for them. If anything should arise in the future, please do not hesitate to reach out and seek our help or advice. Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us and with whomever may also need medical help in the future.

name: Allyson Johnson
text: While on spring break in Gulf Shores, my son had a terrible reaction to his sunburn.  It's a rare condition called "hell's itch" where it feels like ants are biting you under your skin as the skin is healing from the burn.  He was in so much pain and literally wanting to knock himself out to get out of dealing with the pain.  We rushed him to Southern Rapid Care after talking with the children's hospital and they were AMAZING!  They went to work on him fast as they could tell he was in despair.  They saw us quickly, began treatment asap and even gave us medicine when we found out the pharmacy was out of it.  I cannot begin to tell you how thankful we were for their response and care.  I even had one of the nurses follow up with me later in the day to make sure he was ok.  Their treatment both personally and medically was first rate and they went above and beyond to make sure he was treated in a way that gave him relief quickly and permanently.  We are so thankful for you Southern Rapid Care!!!

name: rcmorri2
text: I chose this place at about 2 in the morning based on reviews because I couldn't sleep for the second night in a row. I went first thing in the morning and they sent me back almost immediately after finishing my new patient paperwork. They immediately took the basic things such as temp and heart beat and the doc, Richard Bautista, was in within minutes. I told him what was wrong and he was able to identify the issue but did the necessary tests to make sure it wasn't something more serious or contagious such as flu or strep throat. He offered me coffee or another drink while we waited 10 minutes for the results. Results came back negative so he gave me a couple shots and wrote the scripts I needed and sent them to the pharmacy of my choice. I am writing this 6 hours after my visit and I already feel 10 times better. I was in and out within about 40 minutes and about 15 minutes of that was me filling in necessary paperwork. I rarely write reviews but I felt like they deserved to be complimented for their efficiency and thoroughness (which we all know is rare for doctor visits). The facility was very clean and well kept. I wish my hometown physician ran their operation like this. Thanks for getting me back to where I can enjoy my vacation!

resp.text:
Rcmorri,

There's nothing fun about being up at 2am concerned about how you feel and who might can help the next day. We're so very pleased that you chose us and we were able to help you out. It's nice to help people like yourself get back to 100%. We appreciate you giving us an opportunity to take care of your health needs. Please come see us again if we can ever be of assistance.

-Southern Rapid Care

name: Amy McGlaughn
text: Staff was FABULOUS!!  Clean facility. We were in and out in less than an hour!! If you ever get sick on vacation this is the place to go!!! Thank you so much!!!

name: Brooke Sapp
text:
UPDATE: Theyre submitting this to a board and will de ide if it should have been handled differently, and my MIL MIGHT get SOME of her money back for such an awful experience and "care".

I came in after working on nearby apartments with a palm frawn stuck all the way through the tip of my finger! The doctor who saw me removed it (PARTIALLY) extremely painfully and when i told him that it was still in my finger he disregarded me and told me it was swelling. Nearly a week later as it starts to become infected ipulled out the rest of it which was 1/4 INCH LONG! If i could add a picture of what i pulled out i would!150$ FOR NOTHING! WILL NOT RECOMMEND AND WILL NOT VISIT AGAIN.

name: Kathy Ball
text: My wife Kathy became very ill during our vacation in Orange Beach.  We decided to visit SRC based upon the reviews and are so happy we did. The staff is extremely professional and caring. Kathy was examined and treated within an hour by Dr. Stephens.  She is already responding to her medication and it appears we will be able to enjoy the rest of our vacation in the great state of Alabama.  We definitely recommend this medical facility to anyone requiring urgent health care.

resp.text:
Mr. & Mrs. Ball,

Thank you kindly for your words and for sharing your experience here with us. These are precisely the reasons we do what we do. It's wonderful to be able to help people out, especially when they are on vacation and simply want to get back to having fun and living life normally a bit faster. We're proud you chose us to entrust your care and we hope you have an incredible rest of your trip down to Orange Beach and the beautiful Gulf Coast of Alabama. Please let us know if you have any questions in the future. Take care!

name: Bossier Sox Mom
text:
I just want to say how amazing Liz Michon NP and her staff are. I'm on vacation an my back went out from a fall. Scared knowing I'm 7.5-8hrs away from my doctor who has treated me for this for the last 10 years. I was literally shaking, praying I find some help knowing I'm here until Sunday. When I called and walked in I could hardly sit or move. The lady who answered the phone was like please come we can help you. I was sitting at AFC who had a sign on the door saying they were closed due to the weather. My family was hungry so I was like I can deal with it until tomorrow and maybe it would get better, knowing down deep it wasn't. I tried to have supper with them but couldn't sit without wanting to cry.  This location was close to where we were eating. I got up went across the street and found the most amazing, caring and helpful Quick Care I have ever been to. I would send anyone I know in the Orange Beach area. I'm back at our condo and can sit and enjoy my family. Thank you so much for all your help. I was in and out very quickly but yet they took time with me and made me feel like i was the only patient there.....

Thank you
Naomi Grigsby

name: Kelli Tomsak
text: Nice clean office, nice and professional staff, Dr. Cameron was wonderful and hardly no wait time. Highly recommend!

name: James Sides
text: Very pleased with everyone. VERY NICE, HELPFUL AND CARING. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

name: Jonathan Lyons
text: All of the Ladies handled our visit professionally and went above and beyond even with us coming in close to closing time.

name: Stephen Swan
text: Great facilities, super helpful and friendly staff. The Dr was great and explained everything to us. This was the best urgent care experience I've had. They took great care of my daughter.

name: Brett Morrison
text: We took our little 7 month old baby girl here when they opened on the 4th of July.  We originally took her somewhere closer to us in Gulf Shores but they wouldn't see patients younger than a year old (very frustrating).  This urgent care location was fantastic.  From the nurse that checked us in, to the first MA that we saw, then the Nurse Practitioner, to the doctor, they were all fantastic and seemed to really care! Part of me wanted to knock off a star because while the doctors are ER doctors and in-network with our insurance at the main hospital, this clinic is out-of-network.  But, that's not really the clinics fault as they explained in full how they continue to try and get our insurance provider to open up the clinic to them as well.  They offered us a flat rate fee or the option of filing out-of-network, and we went with the flat rate fee.  In the end, because of the x-rays, we definitely came out on the better end!  If we ever need to go back to an urgent care while vacationing in Gulf Shores, we will definitely drive the extra few miles to come to this one!

resp.text:
Brett,

The genuineness and sincerity in which you wrote your review is refreshing and we appreciate the full truth of the situation you experienced. We are thrilled that we could get you and your family back to enjoying life a little faster but it is unfortunate regarding the insurance dilemma. Ultimately, we want to be able to provide healthcare to anyone and everyone. Although, as you stated, we are currently not credentialed through all insurance policies despite working hard toward those goals. We are glad you were able to go with the flat-rate price for your visit and that this was a feasible option for you. Hopefully by the next time you need us, we will be in-network with most all insurances. Please let us know if we can do anything for you moving forward and hope you enjoyed the remainder of your vacation. Take care.

name: s eloc
text: Stacy RN and Richard PA were awesome. We had a great experience with the staff there with our 2 year old that was sick while on vacation. Thank you for the pleasant and caring experience you gave her!

resp.text:
Sarah,

It was our pleasure to be able to provide care for your daughter. We were saddened you had to worry with her health at all, much less while on vacation. I will make sure that both Stacy and Richard are aware of your review on here because I feel certain it would make their day to know they were able to help you folks out and that it was appreciated this much. We genuinely care for our patients and will do anything to help out. Please give us a call should you need anything in the future. Best of luck to you and your wonderful family. Thanks!

name: Lisa Hanna
text: Amazing experience at this clinic! They got me right in, took my out of state insurance card, and I received wonderful patient centered care. Nurse Practitioner Julie and nurse Nicole were rock stars! Totally the clinic to go to when you need urgent care at the beach!

resp.text:
Lisa,

We are glad to know that your wait time was minimal and that you were pleased with the services and customer service you received while in our office. We thank you for bringing your urgent health care needs to us and for taking time to let others know of your pleasant experience via this Google review. Thank you again and we hope that you will choose to use us in the future, should you need additional health care services.

name: Amber Dudley
text: I went in for a very painful skin condition without insurance. I typically avoid going to see a doctor because it's usually very costly and in the end never helps my problem. These people are absolutely amazing people who actually cared about me and I'm already showing improvement. They took their time and asked for each other's opinions to really get a method down to avoid my allergies and get my skin healed. They were so very caring and nice to me, I was blown away. It's not the cheapest but not the most expensive for someone who doesn't have insurance, but I'm telling you it's worth paying a little extra to not be lied to and given things that don't work. Also it was very quick to get seen. Thanks to all the staff here that helped me.

resp.text:
Amber,

We are terribly sorry you were feeling bad enough to have to seek out medical attention but so very glad you chose us to care for you. It brings us a wonderful sense of pride and accomplishment when we hear stories like yours from patients that genuinely appreciate their experiences with us. You are more than welcome to reach out to us in the future should you have any questions in which we might could help. Thank you so much for coming to see us and taking time out of your day to leave us a review. It is truly appreciated! Hope you stay healthy but please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything in the future. Thanks again!

name: Mark Watson
text: Urgent care visit for drug interaction. Well pleased with the service and care provided. Treatment plan was well explained. Was on a Sunday morning, staff was super friendly and helpful. Highly recommend this office. Hopefully we won't need urgent care again, but I will not hesitate to use them again.

resp.text: Mark,  We are beyond thrilled that you had such a wonderful experience in our clinic. It was our pleasure to provide you with excellent customer service and a thorough explanation of the treatment plan prescribed for you. As always, we also hope that you do not need urgent health services in the future but trust that you will seek our help in the event that you do. Thank you for giving Southern Rapid Care a chance to help you in your time of need and for taking the time to review the services and experience you had in our office.

name: Allison Blake
text: Great friendly staff! We love Dr.Stephens, she was wonderful with my daughter! Office is very nice and clean! We live in the Perdido Key area and usually go to Pensacola but we will definitely come back here!

resp.text:
Allison,

Thank you for your wonderful review and taking a moment to reach out to our staff. We are thrilled to hear that you may be coming to see us for future needs and hope we can always live up to and exceed your expectations of quality healthcare. Please let us know if any questions or concerns arise in the meantime, as we would be proud to help you out. We hope your daughter is feeling much better and look forward to serving you should you need us. Take care and thanks again!

name: Beka Williamson
text: Had to take my son in tonight and they were awesome! He ended up needing medications and all the pharmacies were closed but they had everything!! Also a super clean facility. Thank you for taking such great care of us!

resp.text:
Hey Beka!

Thank you for taking some personal time to review us, we always love to hear feedback on what we are doing well and other areas we may need some improvement. We are thrilled that you had a wonderful experience here but hate that you had to worry about your son's well-being. We certainly hope that he is doing well now and look forward to taking care of you and your family in the future. Thanks again!

-Southern Rapid Care

name: Logical Phunktion
text: Love this place. The staff is so friendly and I feel like the service I get from them is top notch!

resp.text: Well we love you too, Phil. You're pretty top notch yourself!

name: William Clarke
text: They were very thorough and caring. I love it when people take pride in their job and Stacy and Liz are both very good at what they do. I'll never go anywhere else.

resp.text: William, We truly appreciate your business and we like the fact that you recognize the pride we have for what we do. We hope it comes out every time you are with us, as our number one goal is to take care of people to the highest standard of healthcare they could possibly receive. Hope you feel better soon and please do not hesitate to reach out if you should need anything in the future. Thanks!

name: Jessica Blakely
text: The entire staff here is phenomenal!  We've used them several times now for minor traumas and medical issues. Outstanding customer service, clinic efficiency, and patient care! Even if you don't live in Orange Beach and you find yourself in need of a good clinic - Southern Rapid Care is worth the drive!

resp.text: Hey Jessica! What an awesome review, thank you!  Sometimes you have to go to a place a few times before you truly know what kind of people you're dealing with. We're fortunate to be in the Orange Beach community and grateful to be able to care for wonderful people like yourself. If there is anything we can do for you in the future, we trust you'll let us know how to help. Thanks again!

name: Liz Miller
text: Would give zero stars if I could. Got a bad sinus infection while on vacation which they billed me personally for $500! That did not include the antibiotics I got from the pharmacy. I asked while I was there if I had a co-pay or if they needed any additional insurance information. They said they had everything they needed and I was all set to leave. They never tried to bill my insurance even after I called 3 times to give them the claims information. Dealing with them administratively has been a major headache. Standard of care could also use improvement. I had to remind the nurse and doctor a couple times that I do not have a spleen which effects what type of antibiotic to use. Who knew a simple sinus infection would be so complicated! Definitely avoid this place if you can!

resp.text:
Liz,

We are terribly sorry for your lackluster experience with us. If you would like us to, we can take a look at your insurance situation to make sure we didn't make any errors and/or to ensure the claim was processed correctly. While we do use a 3rd party billing agency, we have the ability to review issues in-house. We are eager to help make this right for you so please give our office a call at your earliest convenience and we'll look into everything. We don't want any of our patients to endure the headache of a big medical bill so please let us know how we can help rectify the situation. Our office manager, Whit Stephens would be your best point of contact.

name: Michelle Mulroy
text: Best urgent care we've ever been to.  Facility was very clean and the staff was awesome.  We arrived 10 minutes before closing and they didn't rush with us at all.  Just an absolutely friendly and caring staff.

resp.text:
Cameron,

Thanks for sharing your thoughts on your experiences here at our clinic. You folks were in a bit of a predicament but we are glad you chose us to take care of the situation. Best of luck to you and your family and we hope your have/had a safe trip home. Thank you for choosing Southern Rapid Care!

name: Ashley Clolinger
text: We went in close to closing time with my 6 year old tonight.  The facility is beautiful, but most importantly the staff was wonderful.   My daughter was miserable with a sore throat.  She crying and worried about having to get a shot. All the staff members were so patient with her and caring!!  They reassured her and quickly diagnosed her problem.  She left with dry eyes and already beginning to feel better from the medicine they gave her. (We moved to the area in July and  this was her first visit to a doctor here.  She was nervous about going someplace new. ) Thank you all for your excellent care!!

resp.text:
Ashley,

Thank you so much for a wonderful review! The staff here is overjoyed that you chose Southern Rapid Care to manage your healthcare needs and get your daughter feeling better again. We pride ourselves on upholding wonderful quality with outstanding customer service. In our industry, people do not typically come see us when they are feeling well. We take personal responsibility for making sure feeling bad is a temporary problem and try to get people back to their normal lives quickly. We thoroughly enjoy our island life and know that it can not be fully enjoyed when we are dealing with physical ailments. It brings us immense happiness knowing you and your family were treated well and got back to living life after your visit with us. Thank you so much for taking time to share your pleasant experiences with others!

name: rachel bullard
text: Staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Dr.Cameran was fast and very kind. Would definitely come back!

resp.text:
Rachel,
Thank you for the wonderful review! We're glad you had such a positive experience. We hope you stay healthy but just know we are here if you need us. Take care!

name: christy Daniel
text: No wait! Super nice facility. Staff couldn't have been any nicer and very professional. I was impressed with the doctors. I will definitely recommend this place to friends and family.

resp.text:
Christy,

We are thrilled you didn't have to wait. Our hope is that no matter how big we grow, we always keep the patients' wait time in mind and process everyone as quickly as possible while still providing attentive, excellent care. Thank you kindly for keeping us in mind and for sharing your pleasant experiences here with other people.

-Southern Rapid Care

name: Linoy Dahan
text:
Used to come there ALL the time, brought my son this morning ,Sheila claims to be one of the owners refused to see my son that is 3 (with fever) claimed I was Rude because I asked the front desk few questions, said my tune of voice was rude! I have an accent, that’s why she refused to see my son ( which have nothing to do with that ) how unprofessional of her to refuse to see my 3yrs old!!
I told her I will file a discrimination complaint her response to me was “ to stand in line “!
And am I the rude one ? Wow .. owners need to be switched if this how they treat customers!! Shame!

name: Stephanie Krielow
text: These people are amazing! So glad we ended up here while on vacation. I wish we would get this type of care at home!

resp.text: Stephanie, thank you dearly for the wonderful review of your time at our clinic. However, we genuinely loathe the fact that you had to take time out of your vacation to worry about any form of medical complication. We were happy to get you back to your normal life and enjoying your time on the coast as quickly as possible. Thank you for entrusting your care with our medical professionals and we are honored and delighted to know that if was a pain-free experience for you. We hope you and your family are doing very well and please do not hesitate to give a shout should you have any questions pertaining to your visit.

name: Miranda Hughes
text: I couldn’t have asked for a smoother visit. Super clean, great staff and very professional

resp.text: Thanks Miranda. We try to always be smooth operators! Glad you enjoyed your visit. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you in the future.

name: k t
text: The facility is nice and very clean. Elizabeth Michon and staff were quick, friendly, and thorough. Overall excellent urgent care!

resp.text:
Hey KT,

We are pleased to know you had such a wonderful experience and appreciate you taking the time to share your encounter. We hope that everything is going well now but please reach out if you need anything going forward. It is our mission to make sure every patient we come across is delivered the best possible care in the area. Please let us know if there are any improvements we could make to enhance the patient experience. Thanks again!

name: Joe Bell
